message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $12,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,800? This would be a fair deal for both of us.
Thank you for considering my perspective, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, I believe we could still reach an agreement closer to my budget. Could we possibly settle on $10,500?
